de.mrapp.android.util

Class DisplayUtilTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • AndroidTestCase
      • de.mrapp.android.util.DisplayUtilTest

  • public class DisplayUtilTest
extends AndroidTestCase
    Tests the functionality of the class DisplayUtil.

    • Constructor Summary

      DisplayUtilTest() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void testDeviceTypeGetValue()
      Tests the functionality of the getValue-method of the enum DisplayUtil.DeviceType.
      void testDpToPixelsWithDoubleParameter()
      Tests the functionality of the method, which allows to convert a Double value, which is measured in dp, into a value, which is measured in pixels.
      void testDpToPixelsWithDoubleParameterThrowsException()
      Ensures that a NullPointerException is thrown by the method, which allows to convert a Double value, which is measured in dp into a value, which is measured in pixels, if the context is null.

      Tests the functionality of the fromValue-method of the enum DisplayUtil.DeviceType.
      void testFromValueThrowsException()
      Ensures, that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown by the fromValue-method of the enum DisplayUtil.DeviceType, if the given value is invalid.
      void testGetDeviceType()
      Tests the functionality of the method, which allows to retrieve the type of the device, depending on its screen size.
